alert.note: Alert for Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Trego County through 730 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Ogallah, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wakeeney, Ogallah, Collyer, Trego Center, Voda and Riga. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
